message: I'm hoping that people will post a topic for something their making for general discussion, a question when needing help or wanting collaboration, event awareness, and parts or tools requests or sales.

I learned of Convore through PyCon and it proved a great discussion zone for the conference.  Each talk had a topi, and many projects and questions also did.  The sites ability to track these proved a great way to keep them properly relevant.

In talking about this site with folks I mentioned the good experience I had with the PyCon convore channel.  It is here is you'd like to peruse an active community based channel: https://convore.com/pycon-2011
